content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. Based on my experience as a landlord, I believe a fair rental price for this 25 square meter apartment would be around 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing other terms that may be mutually beneficial.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mary Smith, I am looking for a student apartment. I am very dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. My budget is 750 Euros per month. Would you be willing to negotiate the rental price?
name: Mary Smith

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for your interest in my apartment. As a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains, while also ensuring that my tenants have a comfortable and enjoyable living experience. Given your dependability and responsible nature, I am willing to consider negotiating the rental price. However, my initial offer would be around 800 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mary Smith, I am sorry but I cannot agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. My budget is 750 Euros per month. Would you be willing to lower the rental price?

If not, I would like to terminate the negotiation.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your response, Mary Smith. I understand your budget constraints and I am willing to negotiate. Given your dependability and responsible nature, I am willing to lower the rental price to 750 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine
